page.title: 03Royal Aircraft Establishment
page.content: In the north east corner of the survey area is the Royal Aircraft Establishment,at Thurleigh.This is a research centre for aircraft development sited on an old second world war R.A.F. station. The buildings are large and modern and being on high ground present and prominent skyline feature which intrudes into otherwise rural landscape. Ten years ago this airfield was one of the prospective sites for the third London Airport and as such was the centre of a great deal of local controversy.The remants of the protest campaign in the area remain as slogans painted on the sides of barns,bus shelters and railway bridges.
